objects.name: HelpText
objects.string:
Arrow Keys: Move
Tab: Place 'barrier' (costs 3 wood)
Space: Interact/Attack

parameters: "They will come soon... Take this weapon, and defend us!"
"You pick up the weapon. You can hear them coming!"
"You've removed his power, and will usher in a new age..."
"You've removed his power, and will usher in a new age..."
